title: Reese Witherspoon, 43, and son Deacon, 16, could pass for SIBLINGS
text:
Reese Witherspoon gave a warm shout out to her eldest son Deacon on Wednesday to wish him a happy 16th birthday.

The Morning Show actress posted a photo with the high school student whom she shares with 45-year-old actor Ryan Phillippe. The two looked more like siblings than mother and son.

And the 43-year-old petite blonde also added a glowing tribute in her caption for her nearly 20M followers.

Her boy: Reese Witherspoon gave a warm shout out to her eldest son Deacon on Wednesday to wish him a happy 16th birthday

They look more like brother and sister! They have 27 years between them, but they look to be only a few years apart

'Happy 16th Birthday to this guy whose bright smile makes every day better,' began the Big Little Lies star and producer.

The former child star added, 'Kind, compassionate, hysterical and friendly... I’m so lucky to have a son like you! @deaconphillippe ❤️.'

Reese also has daughter Ava, who is now in college, and son Tennessee, whose father is her husband Jim Toth, a talent agent who works with Matthew McConaughey.

They were once married: Reese and Ryan in 2001 in Southampton, New York

Witherspoon was last seen at the 26th Annual Elle Women of Hollywood Celebration at The Four Seasons Hotel in Beverly Hills on Monday.

The Mud actress was among a slew of high-profile celebrities who strutted their stuff on the red carpet, and again on stage, when they addressed the excited audience.

The cover girl oozed style in a black mini dress that fell to just above her knees.

Adding to its appeal, the number had ruffles around the front and sheer fabric along the long sleeves.

Hollywood mama: Here Deacon, right, is seen with his sister Ava Elizabeth Phillippe when Witherspoon was honored at The Hollywood Walk Of Fame in 2010

Only four years ago: The star with her kids in LA in October 2015

On this night, she wore black heels and styled her trademark blonde tresses long along the back and sides, but pulled back off of her face in the front.

Jameela Jamil took to her Instagram Story and shared a quick clip of Witherspoon on stage as she wowed the audience with her infectious wit and personality.

'She was the first person I ever interviewed 10 years ago. She was lovely then and is lovely now,' the British actress and radio presenter wrote across the video.

All together now: The Wild actress has moved on to Jim Toth with whom she has son Tennessee; seen in December 2016 at the Sing premiere in LA

Before the event got started, Witherspoon made the rounds and stopped to have a quickly chat with Natalie Portman. The two, who both flashed big beaming smiles, looked to be overjoyed to see each other.

The pair have been working together of late: Witherspoon co-produced the new science fiction drama Lucy In The Sky that stars Portman in the lead role alongside Jon Hamm, Zazie Beetz, Dan Stevens, Colman Domingo and Ellen Burstyn.

Portman, Scarlett Johansson , Gwyneth Paltrow and Nicole Kidman were among the ten Hollywood heavyweights to be honored at this year's 26th annual event.

The other honorees included Dolly Parton, Zendaya, Mindy Kaling, Lena Waite, Melinda Matsoukas and Jodie Turner-Smith.

Charlize Theron, Margot Robbie and Diane Lane were also part of prestigious guest list.

Star-studded: Witherspoon, 43, was among the A-list actresses to attend Elle's Women In Hollywood Celebration in Beverly Hills on Monday

Witherspoon will also be wearing the producer hat for the upcoming Australian crime drama The Dry, that stars Eric Bana, Genevieve O'Reilly, Keir O'Donnell and John Polson.

As for her still-thriving acting career: The New Orleans native joins Jennifer Aniston, Steve Carell. Billy Cudrup and Mark Duplass in the upcoming comedy drama series The Morning Show, which is set to premiere on Apple TV+ November 1.

She will also share the leading lady role with Kerry Washington in the upcoming Hulu drama miniseries Little Fires Everywhere. It is slated to premiere sometime in 2020.
description: The Morning Show actress posted a photo with the high school student whom she shares with 45-year-old actor Ryan Phillippe, her ex-husband.
